title: Weird account issue I can't solve
body:
Hey all!

Hoping I can get a hand with this. I have a very very strange issue which I'm unable to resolve even through the ticket system because it revolves around my email address.

I have an account I used a fair while ago that stopped being used and now I've forgotten both the password associated with the account and the email address which I believe was one made solely for the signing up of the LoL account. This means I can't reset the password and I can't send a support ticket because they require correspondence by email. I have spent a fair amount of money on the account and would like to be able to use it again.

Information I DO have access to is the Username of the account, credit card details for payments made for RP and origination answers including location of sign up, etc.

Is there any chance I can get back access to my account? I'd HATE to start a new account and have to rebuy champions and skins. 

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Well, have you tried recovering the password for the e-mail account associated with the League account? Or do you mean that you've completely and utterly forgotten all details pertaining to the e-mail account as well, including any extra security features (such as phone recovery) that you may have employed on it?

Try opening up a support ticket on the account which you *do* have access to and correspond with the bot there. Look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694) for instructions on how to do so. The bot will ask you for proof of your account, such as items purchased, recent transactions, friends list, screenshots, etc.

Best of luck.
